overview: Provide the Coverity command you want to run.
The command should start with the name of the Coverity command you want to run. Ex: cov-build, cov-analyze, etc.
For examples and a list of the available environment variables that can be used, refer to Command Examples
Specify the URL for your Coverity Connect instance.
Specify credentials for authenticating with your Coverity Connect instance.
notes: "Username with password" is the only kind of credentials supported.
